com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene

Class SceneObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tyrlib2.graphics.scene.SceneObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Affector, BoundedSceneObject, Camera, Emitter, Light, Octree, ParticleSystem, Skybox, Text2

    public abstract class SceneObject
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic abstract class for representing scene objects. The objects can be attached to SceneNode objects in order to be positioned.
    Author:
    Sascha

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SceneObject() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attachTo(SceneNode node)
      Attaches this object to a SceneNode
      SceneNode detach()
      Detaches this node from its parent
      Vector3 getAbsolutePos()
      Gets the absolute position of this SceneObject
      float[] getModelMatrix()
      Get the model matrix of this scene object
      SceneNode getParent()
      Gets the parent SceneNode of this object
      Vector3 getRelativePos()
      Gets the position of this SceneObject relative to the parent of the parent SceneNode
      void onTransformed()
      Called if the node to which this scene object is attached to has been transformed due to translation, rotation, etc
